  • java.lang.Object

extends BaseWrappedClass

    Title: VirtualMachine

    Description: Wrapper class for Attach API's com.sun.tools.attach.VirtualMachine

    Company: Helios Development Group LLC

    Author:
    Whitehead (nwhitehead AT heliosdev DOT org)
